articles.description: Day four of the Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics, with US Olympic gold medallists Alex Hall and Mikaela Shiffrin in action.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day four - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot says this season is the toughest he has had as a manager "by a mile" and his side are "not performing to Liverpool's standards".
articles.title: Liverpool: Arne Slot says this season is toughest he has had as a manager 'by a mile'

articles.description: Arsenal are top of the league, fighting for trophies in four competitions and at the same time £64m striker Viktor Gyokeres looks to be finding his feet in north London.
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres: Has Arsenal forward finally found form?

articles.description: With Aden Durde having become the first overseas coach to win the Super Bowl, what does it mean for the NFL and the international game?
articles.title: Super Bowl 2026: Why British coach Aden Durde is 'game-changer' for champions Seattle Seahawks

articles.description: The knee injury which scuppered Jean-Philippe Mateta's move to AC Milan last month is "not as bad as feared" and he will not need surgery, says Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner.
articles.title: Jean-Philippe Mateta: Crystal Palace striker's injury 'not as bad as feared', says Oliver Glasner

articles.description: Jen Dodds and Bruce Mouat suffer Winter Olympic heartbreak in the mixed doubles curling for the second time in four years after losing out on bronze to hosts Italy.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Bruce Mouat & Jen Dodds denied curling bronze as GB medal wait continues

articles.description: Real Madrid striker Endrick's impact on loan at Lyon has been immediate, and is fuelling the teenager's "dream" of playing for Brazil at the World Cup.
articles.title: Lyon loan helping 'explosive' Endrick's World Cup 'dream' with Brazil

articles.description: Captain Maro Itoje returns to the England starting XV for Saturday's Six Nations match against Scotland in Edinburgh.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: England's Maro Itoje returns to starting XV for Scotland game

articles.description: Clare Connor, the managing director of England women, will leave the England and Wales Cricket Board after this summer's home Women's T20 World Cup
articles.title: Clare Connor to leave England role after Women's T20 World Cup

articles.description: San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman Keion White has surgery after being shot in the ankle.
articles.title: Keion White: San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman has surgery after being shot in ankle
